news.title: Treasury yields jump on prospect of U.S. having to refund tariff money; 30-year yield tops 4.98%
news.summary: U.S. Treasury yields were higher on Tuesday as investors looked ahead to a key jobs report on Friday and monitored the latest tariff developments.

news.title: Kraft Heinz to split into two companies
news.summary: The deal will reverse much of the $46 billion merger envisioned by Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway and private equity firm 3G Capital.

news.title: Pepsi shares jump 5% as activist Elliott takes $4 billion stake, sees 'historic' value opportunity
news.summary: The Paul Singer-founded Elliott's bet in Pepsi is worth $4 billion, becoming the consumer giant's top five active investors excluding index funds.

news.title: McDonald's to expand value menu as CEO says the chain aims to reach more customers
news.summary: McDonald's is bringing back its Extra Value Meals as it tries to appeal to price-sensitive customers. McDonald's is bring back itsextravaluemeals.com. Click here for more information.

news.title: Amgen to invest $600 million in new research and development facility in California
news.summary: President Donald Trump threatens to impose tariffs on pharmaceuticals imported into the U.S. It is the latest U.N. investment by a drugmaker.

news.title: Beer sales have dropped off. Modelo and Corona parent’s stock dives to a 5-year low.
news.summary: Shares of Constellation Brands, parent of Corona and Modelo beer, sank to a five-year low after a profit and sales warning.

news.title: Big Warren Buffett–backed merger calls it quits as Kraft Heinz announces breakup
news.summary: Berkshire Hathaway-backed food giant will get shares in two publicly traded food companies to be named at a later date. Shareholders of the Berkshire Hathaway–backed food company will get Shares in Two Publicly traded Food Companies to be Named at a Later date.

news.title: Dr. Oz is saving the government more money than Elon Musk and ‘DOGE’ ever did
news.summary: Medicare and Medicaid chief cracks down on payment practices and insurance companies. But costs are still rising. Trump’s Medicare and Medicaid Chief cracks down, but costs still rise.

news.title: Feeling Powerball fever as the jackpot hits $1.3 billion? This former lottery addict who lost around $1 million has a warning for you.
news.summary: Adam Osmond gambled away a fortune on lottery games, but he eventually sought help. He was diagnosed with bipolar disorder after a series of near-fatal accidents.

news.title: This one move could give Trump a win on global tariffs — and calm the bond market
news.summary: A bipartisan congressional bill would impose a 10% minimum tariff — with stiffer rates for China. The bill would apply to all countries, not just China.
